reviews_name: Office Viewer – Word Office for Docx & PDF Reader APK

detail_application.Name: Office Viewer – Word Office for Docx & PDF Reader
detail_application.descriptions:
Office Viewer – Word Office for Docx, PDF Reader & Document Editor is to provide you one-stop working on office word for android. Office tools and unique and intuitive UI design ensures you enjoy the best mobile office experience.
Office for Android – Office Reader & Document Editor Highlights Features
► Supports All Office File Formats:
• Microsoft Office Word, Excel, PowerPoint (.DOC, .XLS, .PPT, .PPS, .DOCX, .XLSX, .PPTX, .PPSX)
• Rich Text Format (.RTF)
• Hanword Document (.HWP)
• Corel WordPerfect (.WPD)
• IBM Lotus Word Pro (.LWP)
• OpenDocument Text, Spreadsheet, Presentation, Graphics (.ODT, .ODS, .ODP, .ODG)
• WPS Office Writer, Presentation, Spreadsheet (.WPS, .DPS, .ET)
• Apple iWork Pages, Numbers, Keynote (.PAGES, .NUMBERS, .KEY)
• Microsoft Works (.WPS)
• AbiWord (.ABW)
• HTML files (.HTM, .HTML)
• Text files (.TXT, .CSS, .XML, .JAVA, .C,..)
► Office Reader & Document Editor with Create spreadsheets.
– Edit spreadsheets files from OpenOffice, LibreOffice that creates and edits XLS spreadsheets,
– Cell styles management.
– Search for texts.
– Insert columns / rows.
– Delete rows / columns.
– Find & replace text for
► Easy to Use and Powerful Functions for PDF Reader: PDF Reader and PDF Editor
+ PDF Reader, PDF Viewer
+ PDF Editor: edit pdf file with all function
+ Free PDF Converter, PDF Reader and PDF Editor
+ Fastest PDF viewing engine and smooth navigation
+ Write directly on a PDF, highlight and underline text, and more
+ Annotate PDFs with others in real time
+ Fill PDF forms and sign documents
► Office for Android with function for Word, documents viewer
+ Edit documents like edit word docx file, edit excel files, txt editor
+ Create document (docx files)
+ Read all formats files for docx viewer
+ Copy and edit document as like ms word with docx
+ Share your documents
+ Edit documents fastest and full option Document Editor
► PPT Viewer is an great tool to find your all PPT from SD card and collect them at one place and view them w★ View PPT with high quality. Edit PPT easily from this app.
★ You can also add text in existing PPT File with custom font and styles.
★ Support Various PPT features to make this tool more useable for you.
★ Support Offline mode to use easily.
★ Easy to use and very simple UI.
★ Delete PPT easily from your device.
★ Get All PPT File at one place to perform various operation.ith single touch
★ Fast Scroll with zoom in and Zoom out animation.
★ Easy to share on single click.
★ Go to particular page on page click in horizontal view in bottom of screen.
★ Change orientation view of PPT
★ Show PPT page in separate Mode to see in full screen.
★ Use App anywhere anytime on the GO.
★ Rename PPT File to search easily
★ You can Print PPT easily by single Click.
★ View PPT horizontally or vertically according to your choice.
★ Add Image To PPT File and adjust according to your requirement.
★ Jump Specific Page During reading now.
★ Shows your reading page number in sliding bar
Office for Android – Free Word, Excel, PDF & Slide: Office Reader & Document Editor is a free office app with all-in-one feature to view, edit, share, memo and archive all types of documents anytime and anywhere.
Customize your document, letter, resume, or notes your way with robust tools that enable you to accomplish your best writing with the best format options.
Thanks for using Office Viewer – Word Office for Docx, PDF Reader & Document Editor . If you have questions or suggestions, please send the email support.
